data.name: Abzan Devotee
data.oracle_text:
{1}: Add {W}, {B}, or {G}. Activate only once each turn.
{2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: The Kin-Trees rediscovered after Dromoka's fall are tended by carefully chosen wardens.

data.name: Abzan Monument
data.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, search your library for a basic Plains, Swamp, or Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{W}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Create an X/X white Spirit creature token, where X is the greatest toughness among creatures you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

data.name: A-Cori-Steel Cutter
Adorned Crocodile
data.oracle_text:
When this creature dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie Druid creature token.

data.flavor_text:
"Eat you? Of course she won't. Pherah's got better taste than that."
—Visk, Qarsi Palace caretaker

data.name: Aegis Sculptor
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

data.name: Agent of Kotis
data.oracle_text: Renew — {3}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
data.flavor_text:
"I trust Narset. I do not trust those she keeps counsel with."
—Kotis, the Fangkeeper

data.name: Aggressive Negotiations
data.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
data.flavor_text:
"When an alliance outlasts its usefulness it's best to end it quickly."
—Heng, Sultai ambassador

data.name: Ainok Wayfarer
data.oracle_text: When this creature enters, mill three cards. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. (To mill three cards, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
data.flavor_text: "There has to be a faster route through Sagu Jungle. Give me a week."

data.name: Alchemist's Assistant
data.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Renew — {1}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a lifelink counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
data.flavor_text:
"Do not test the mandrill. He knows a thief when he sees one."
—Notice posted at Lu Fen's apothecary

data.name: Alesha's Legacy
data.oracle_text: Target creature you control gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
data.flavor_text: "If I die today, I will ensure my death is worthy of legend."

data.name: All-Out Assault
data.oracle_text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
When this enchantment enters, if it's your main phase, there is an additional combat phase after this phase followed by an additional main phase. When you next attack this turn, untap each creature you control.

Flash
First strike

{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

"The best way to protect the citizens is to defend Arashin, not hunt dragonstorms across Tarkir."

Flying

"Dragons working alongside the Abzan, not as overlords but as equals. It feels like a dream."

data.name: Auroral Procession
data.oracle_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: The Temur celebrate the end of the Unbroken Night with stories, dances, and feasts. They gather to witness the first light of dawn as the land sings in harmony.

Deathtouch
Mobilize X, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (Whenever this creature attacks, create X tapped and attacking 1/1 red Warrior creature tokens. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.)

data.name: Awaken the Honored Dead
data.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Destroy target nonland permanent.
II — Mill three cards.
III — You may discard a card. When you do, return target creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Barrensteppe Siege

As this enchantment enters, choose Abzan or Mardu.
• Abzan — At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
• Mardu — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died under your control this turn, each opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice.

data.name: Bearer of Glory

During your turn, this creature has first strike.
{4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

data.name: Betor, Kin to All
data.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, if creatures you control have total toughness 10 or greater, draw a card. Then if creatures you control have total toughness 20 or greater, untap each creature you control. Then if creatures you control have total toughness 40 or greater, each opponent loses half their life, rounded up.

data.oracle_text: Draw three cards. Creatures your opponents control get -3/-0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Temur scouts reported the arrival of unwanted visitors, and the whisperers ensured a chilling welcome.

"Life is full of tough calls. We honor the dead today to make better decisions tomorrow."
—Uruna, Mardu lieutenant

data.name: Herd Heirloom
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.
{T}: Until end of turn, target creature you control with power 4 or greater gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."

data.name: Heritage Reclamation
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: With an echoing crash the effigy fell, the symbol of Atarka's tyranny expunged from Temur lands.

data.name: Highspire Bell-Ringer
data.oracle_text:
Flying
The second spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast.
data.flavor_text: The sequence of chimes rang out a specific alarm: dragonstorm, half a day, southwest.

data.name: Hollowmurk Siege
data.oracle_text:
As this enchantment enters, choose Sultai or Abzan.
• Sultai — Whenever a counter is put on a creature you control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
• Abzan — Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature. It gains menace until end of turn.

data.name: Host of the Hereafter
data.oracle_text:
This creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, if it had counters on it, put its counters on up to one target creature you control.
data.flavor_text: "I agreed to return and aid the Sultai. My friends here agreed to return and aid me."

data.name: Humbling Elder
data.oracle_text:
Flash
When this creature enters, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"There is no better way to measure a person's true character than to let them think they're above you."
—Master Xian

data.name: Hundred-Battle Veteran
data.oracle_text:
As long as there are three or more different kinds of counters among creatures you control, this creature gets +2/+4.
You may cast this card from your graveyard. If you do, it enters with a finality counter on it. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)
data.flavor_text: She's eager to start a new winning streak.

data.name: Iceridge Serpent
data.oracle_text: When this creature enters, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text:
"Even dragons avoid Glintglaze Lake in this season. Which of you youngsters can tell me why?"
—Teacher Eliam

data.name: Inevitable Defeat
data.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text:
"We came seeking a challenge. It seems we must continue searching."
—Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

data.name: Inspirited Vanguard
data.oracle_text: Whenever this creature enters or attacks, it endures 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on it or create a 2/2 white Spirit creature token.)
data.flavor_text: Abzan soldiers know they never enter battle alone.

data.name: Iridescent Tiger
data.oracle_text: When this creature enters, if you cast it, add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.
data.flavor_text: The power of the dragonstorms transformed not only the land but many of the creatures within it.

data.name: Jade-Cast Sentinel
data.oracle_text:
Reach
{2}, {T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
data.flavor_text: Set in motion by artificers long forgotten, it remained loyal through the ages to the occupants of Kheru City.

data.name: Jeskai Brushmaster
data.oracle_text:
Double strike
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
data.flavor_text: Elegance. Precision. Grace. Qualities that must be practiced in writing as well as combat.

data.name: Jeskai Devotee
data.oracle_text:
Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{1}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}. Activate only once each turn.
data.flavor_text: A master of the Whirling Blade technique, he did not hesitate to leap to the monastery's defense.

data.name: Jeskai Monument
data.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, search your library for a basic Island, Mountain, or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{U}{R}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.

data.name: Jeskai Revelation
data.oracle_text: Return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand. Jeskai Revelation deals 4 damage to any target. Create two 1/1 white Monk creature tokens with prowess. Draw two cards. You gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text:
"No one of us could have built all this alone. A clan, a school, hope for the future. Thank you all."
—Narset, to Shiko, Taigam, and Elsha

data.name: Jeskai Shrinekeeper
data.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Like clouds and snow, Jeskai dragons prefer to drift among the monastery's highest spires.

data.name: Jungle Hollow
data.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
data.flavor_text: Long-standing disagreements between the Sultai and Abzan about how to honor their dead have led to rare but fierce skirmishes.

data.name: Karakyk Guardian
data.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, trample
This creature has hexproof if it hasn't dealt damage yet. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
data.flavor_text: As the Temur returned to Karakyk during the chill of winter, some shadows overhead were a blessing rather than a threat.

data.name: Kheru Goldkeeper
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard during your turn, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
Renew — {2}{B}{G}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put two +1/+1 counters and a flying counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

data.name: Kin-Tree Nurturer
data.oracle_text:
Lifelink
When this creature enters, it endures 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token.)
data.flavor_text: "Thank the ancestors. A few more weeks, and we would have discovered nothing but dead wood and lost kin."

data.name: Kin-Tree Severance
data.oracle_text: Exile target permanent with mana value 3 or greater.
data.flavor_text:
"For his crimes—burn his blood and cut him from his ancestors. Perennation is only for family."
—Dictate of House Mevak in the banishment of Oret

data.name: Kishla Skimmer
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a card leaves your graveyard during your turn, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
data.flavor_text: "Rising waters have flooded many old places from the dragon's rule. I do not miss them."

data.name: Kishla Trawlers
data.oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. When you do, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text:
"Fish are like any other crop or flock. They must be carefully tended and never overharvested."
—Nasath, Kishla fisher

This land enters tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {G}.
{3}{G}, {T}: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

data.name: Knockout Maneuver
data.oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
data.flavor_text: An exceptional bout during the Zenith celebration will be noted by Temur elders and result in recruitment for higher ranks.

data.name: Kotis, the Fangkeeper
data.oracle_text:
Indestructible
Whenever Kotis deals combat damage to a player, exile the top X cards of their library, where X is the amount of damage dealt. You may cast any number of spells with mana value X or less from among them without paying their mana costs.

data.name: Krotiq Nestguard
data.oracle_text:
Defender
{2}{G}: This creature can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
data.flavor_text: The bushwhacker's machete glanced off the root with a sickening crack. Slowly, the entire undergrowth turned to face him.

data.name: Krumar Initiate

data.flavor_text: "Welcome," the spirits of House Emesh whispered to Cemal. "Welcome, newest sprout of our Kin-Tree."

When this creature enters, you may mill cards equal to the number of lands you control.

data.oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Lie in Wait deals damage equal to that card's power to target creature.

Flying, vigilance

data.name: Mox Jasper
data.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control a Dragon.
data.flavor_text:

—Sarkhan

You may have this creature enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

data.name: Narset, Jeskai Waymaster
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw cards equal to the number of spells you've cast this turn.
data.flavor_text: "Each step we take is a decision that changes the course of our futures. We must be careful where we tread."

data.name: Narset's Rebuke
data.oracle_text: Narset's Rebuke deals 5 damage to target creature. Add {U}{R}{W}. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text: With a swift motion Narset struck Sarkhan down. She would not let his fevered dreams of draconic dominance come to fruition. Not after all she had done to free Tarkir.

data.name: Nature's Rhythm
data.oracle_text:
Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Harmonize {X}{G}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its harmonize cost. You may tap a creature you control to reduce that cost by an amount of generic mana equal to its power. Then exile this spell.)

data.name: Neriv, Heart of the Storm
data.oracle_text:
Flying
If a creature you control that entered this turn would deal damage, it deals twice that much damage instead.
data.flavor_text: Scales streaked with lightning, trailing thunder in his wake, Neriv is the living banner around which the Mardu rally.

data.name: New Way Forward
data.oracle_text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. When damage is prevented this way, New Way Forward deals that much damage to that source's controller and you draw that many cards.

{T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}.

data.name: Perennation

data.name: Poised Practitioner

data.flavor_text:

—Narset
